mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, RANK, MEMO, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT, TO_CHAR(MOD_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT, DEL_YN FROM POSITION_MNG_TB WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSITION_MNG_TB(SEQ, RANK, MEMO, REG_DT, DEL_YN) VALUES(POSITION_MNG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rank}, #{memo}, SYSDATE, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, RANK, MEMO, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT, TO_CHAR(MOD_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT, DEL_YN FROM ( SELECT SEQ, RANK, MEMO, REG_DT, MOD_DT, DEL_YN, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS SORT_NUM FROM POSITION_MNG_TB ) POSITION_MNG WHERE SORT_NUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM POSITION_MNG_TB WHERE SEQ > 0 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
